Tucson could not help but smile at Talon's complement.  Even though his dam=
ages caused him slight pain, he did not want to come across as a bot with a=
 low tolerance.  The more he sat there, the more he began to get in touch w=
ith his sociable side.  He could sense where Talon was, and is sure to put =
a gentile hand on her shoulder.

" Well, if it hadn't been for Kup's traini=
ng, I don't think I'd be as skilled as I am.  I sure do miss him.  I can't =
remember much about what really happened and how I got separated from the o=
ther Autobots. I know I was hit, and I got severely damaged by an unexpecte=
d blow to my processor..  I wish I could remember where that blast came fro=
m and who it was from."  

He tries to get up but weakness takes its toll o=
n him.

"Ughhh, yeah, that hit definitely took a lot out of me.  Tell Lord =
Perseus that I'm going to need a little road side assistance.  Let's see. I=
 - think it's best that I try to transform, that way, it's easier to wheel =
me out of here.  

Slowly he manages to transform into his vehicle mode and=
 barely makes it as several metal plates shift with a bit of a lag.

" That=
's - better.  Kup - warned me there'd be - days like this."

 neutralize the greater effects although, I don't

 But - for now, danger averted."

n.

ing with

to Lord Perseus.

h one minion has

be bringing him

him personally."
